content.title: Mission
description: Basaveshwar English Medium School Yaragatti is committed to provide an outstanding educational experience, helping to groom a new generation of students to become the leaders of tomorrow with sound moral and ethical values.

We have been functioning with highly qualified, dedicated and service minded teachers. School has maintained a commitment to providing the highest caliber of artistic and educational experience to exceptionally talented young mind from around the world.

We strongly believe in Nehru’s words, Children are like buds in a garden and should be carefully and lovingly nurtured, as they are future of the Nation and the citizens tomorrow. We indulge ourselves in bringing up the students with good education and with good morals. They believe in ennobling the individual by inculcating the right values, building on spiritual strength and aiding intellectual growth.

We promotes creative thinking and lifelong learning. Our School follows CBSE Curriculum. Our educators are dedicated to inspire children, to achieve the highest standards in all their endeavors as they progress their educational journey with us.
We provide an opportunity to take part in inter school competitions also. School running the classes from Nursery to IV std. From this year we are opened the admissions for the V std.

content.title: History
description: We started the Institute believing in Our greatest natural resource, The minds of our children. Children are the future of our nation, so the main aim of Basaveshwar English Medium school is to impart quality education to all our children to mould them as good citizens to the society. We feel proud that having greatest opportunity to train young minds of the nation to build stronger society with public responsibility.

Under the management of Shri Maradi Basaveshwar Vidya Prasar Mandal & blessings of Lord Basaveshwar , BBasaveshwar English Medium School came into existence on 1st June 2015. The credit of establishing BEMS must goes to the entire board of management.

Board of Management includes hon’ble President of society Shri. G.V.Devaraddi sir, secretary Shri P.H.Patil sir, Vice president Shri. A.Y.Patil sir , Directors Shri. Shrimant A.K.Desai, Shri. V.G.Devaraddi, Shri. V.G.Koppad, Shri. B.A.Ugaragol, Shri. A.G.Pattar, Shri D.B.Kanaki, Shri F.H.Khamoshi, Shri T.K.Patil, Shri B.P.Gani, Shri M.B.Tadasalur, Shri U.V.Itnal and President of BEMS Shri. R.G.Devaraddi sir. They all put enormous effort to bring up the school.
Now BEMS is running 5th year successfully with a continous, constant help & support given by parents as well as the entire Board of Management.

content.title: Aim
description: We strive to provide world-class education to our students,We always aim at the students development.

All the courses we offer are unique in that they are aligned to the topics and curriculum prescribed by their respective certifying bodies. However, we go the extra mile by providing need-based education to our Students.
All our teachers, without exception, are experienced and certified in their respective fields. They are aware of the trends in the job-market and remain current in their subjects.
It is worth mentioning that we are among a handful of CBSE Schools in Yaragatti, Bailhongal and Savadatti region that employ full-time teaching staff.
